note: The class will always be srap:SRAPResource.
Resource type, using the COAR Resorce Types vocabulary.
A language of the resource.
An entity responsible for making the resource.
The name of an entity responsible for making the resource.
An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
The name of an entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
An entity responsible for making the resource available.
The name of an entity responsible for making the resource available.
A name or identifier of a related resource; use the SRAPResource shape if additional information is desired.
A SRAPResource description of a related resource.
A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.
A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.
Information describing the accessibility features of a resource, including technical details.
A RAiD handle or other identifier for the project.
A grant that directly or indirectly provides funding or sponsorship for the resource.
Organization or organizational unit where the scholarly activity was conducted.
The class will always be srap:Person.
Name of person
Identifier for the person, such as ORCID
The role of the person in the context of the publication, expressed using MARC relators.
The class will always be srap:Organization.
Name of the organization
Identifier for the organization
The role of the organization in the context of the publication, expressed using MARC relators.
The class will always be srap:Grant
The name or identifier of the funder; use the Organization shape if additional information is desired.
Information about the funder.
An identifier for the grant or other funding.
Class (always bibo:Periodical or one of its subclasses)
A name given to the resource. Titles in different languages provided separately
Name of the publisher
The International Standard Serial Number, ISSN, an identifier for the printed version of serial publications.
The International Standard Serial Number, ISSN, an identifier for electronic versions of serial publications.
The class will always be bibo:Book or one of its subclasses.
A contributor to the book, either a person or a named group or organization.
The name of an entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
The publisher of the book
Date of publication
The International Standard Book Number of the resource.
